pkgmetadata.longdescription: Convert Files Between Markdown or Rmarkdown Files and Mindmaps // Convert Markdown ('.md') or Rmarkdown ('.Rmd') files into mindmap widgets or files ('.mm'), and vice versa. FreeMind mindmap ('.mm') files can be opened by or imported to common mindmap software such as 'FreeMind' (http://freemind.sourceforge.net/wiki/index.php/Main_Page) and 'XMind' (http://www.xmind.net).
